Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about BELAB and how to become a member.
What is BELAB?
BELAB is a collaborative network that connects private and public laboratories across various sectors. It facilitates knowledge sharing and professional development through workshops and events. Members benefit from reduced rates for participation in EUROLAB and EURACHEM activities.
How to join BELAB?
Joining BELAB is straightforward. Interested parties can fill out a membership application on our website. Once approved, you will gain access to exclusive resources and events.
What are the benefits?
Members enjoy a range of benefits, including discounted rates for workshops and seminars. Access to a network of professionals across various fields enhances collaboration and knowledge sharing. Additionally, members receive updates on industry standards and best practices.
Who can join?
BELAB membership is open to all laboratories and institutions involved in testing, inspection, certification, and calibration. Whether public or private, organizations can benefit from our collaborative environment. We welcome members from various sectors to join our community.

Still have questions?

We’re here to help!
